|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6758">0xC020401C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6758">0xC020401C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6759">-1071628260</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6759">-1071628260</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6760">DTS_E_NOERRORDESCFORCOMPONENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6760">DTS_E_NOERRORDESCFORCOMPONENT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6761">コンポーネントからエラー コードの説明が提供されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6761">The component does not supply error code descriptions.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6762">0xC020401D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6762">0xC020401D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6763">-1071628259</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6763">-1071628259</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6764">DTS_E_UNRECOGNIZEDERRORCODE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6764">DTS_E_UNRECOGNIZEDERRORCODE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6765">指定されたエラー コードはこのコンポーネントに関連付けられていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6765">The specified error code is not associated with this component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6766">0xC020401F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6766">0xC020401F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6767">-1071628257</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6767">-1071628257</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6768">DTS_E_TRUNCATIONTRIGGEREDREDIRECTION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6768">DTS_E_TRUNCATIONTRIGGEREDREDIRECTION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6769">切り捨てにより、切り捨て処理の設定に基づいて行がリダイレクトされました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6769">A truncation caused a row to be redirected, based on the truncation disposition settings.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6770">0xC0204020</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6770">0xC0204020</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6771">-1071628256</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6771">-1071628256</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6772">DTS_E_CANTSETUSAGETYPETOREADWRITE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6772">DTS_E_CANTSETUSAGETYPETOREADWRITE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6773">"%1" では、系列 ID が %2!d! の入力列を読み取り/書き込みに設定できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6773">The "%1" is unable to make the column with lineage ID %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6774">この列でその使用法の種類は使用できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6774">read/write because that usage type is not allowed on this column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6775">入力列の使用法の種類を、このコンポーネントではサポートされていない種類 UT_READWRITE に変更しようとしました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6775">An attempt was made to change the usage type of an input column to a type, UT_READWRITE, that is not supported on this component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6776">0xC0204023</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6776">0xC0204023</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6777">-1071628253</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6777">-1071628253</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6778">DTS_E_CANTSETUSAGETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6778">DTS_E_CANTSETUSAGETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6779">%1 は、系列 ID が %2!d! の入力列を、要求された使用法の種類で使用することを禁止されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6779">The %1 has forbidden the requested use of the input column with lineage ID %2!d!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6780">0xC0204024</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6780">0xC0204024</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6781">-1071628252</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6781">-1071628252</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6782">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETUSAGETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6782">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETUSAGETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6783">"%1" は、系列 ID が %2!d! の入力列に対して、要求された変更を行うことができませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6783">The "%1" was unable to make the requested change to the input column with lineage ID %2!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6784">エラー コード 0x%3!8.8X! により、要求が失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6784">The request failed with error code 0x%3!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6785">入力列の使用法の種類を設定しようとして、このエラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6785">The specified error occurred while attempting to set the usage type of an input column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6786">0xC0204025</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6786">0xC0204025</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6787">-1071628251</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6787">-1071628251</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6788">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6788">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6789">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、"%1" にデータ型のプロパティを設定できませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6789">Attempt to set the data type properties on "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6790">出力列の 1 つ以上のデータ型のプロパティを設定中に、エラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6790">The error occurred while attempting to set one or more of the data type properties of the output column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6791">0xC0204026</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6791">0xC0204026</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6792">-1071628250</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6792">-1071628250</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6793">DTS_E_UNABLETORETRIEVEMETADATA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6793">DTS_E_UNABLETORETRIEVEMETADATA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6794">"%1" のメタデータを取得できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6794">The metadata for "%1" cannot be retrieved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6795">オブジェクト名が正しくて、オブジェクトが存在することを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6795">Make sure the object name is correct and the object exists.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6796">0xC0204027</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6796">0xC0204027</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6797">-1071628249</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6797">-1071628249</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6798">DTS_E_CANNOTMAPOUTPUTCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6798">DTS_E_CANNOTMAPOUTPUTCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6799">出力列は、外部メタデータ列にマッピングできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6799">The output column cannot be mapped to an external metadata column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6800">0xC0204028</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6800">0xC0204028</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6801">-1071628248</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6801">-1071628248</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6802">DTS_E_UNSUPPORTEDVARIABLETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6802">DTS_E_UNSUPPORTEDVARIABLETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6803">変数 %1 は、"%2" 型にする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6803">The variable %1 is required to be of type "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6804">0xC020402A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6804">0xC020402A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6805">-1071628246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6805">-1071628246</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6806">DTS_E_CANTSETEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6806">DTS_E_CANTSETEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6807">%1 では外部メタデータ列のデータ型プロパティの設定を行うことができません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6807">The %1 does not allow setting external metadata column datatype properties.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6808">0xC020402B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6808">0xC020402B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6809">-1071628245</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6809">-1071628245</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6810">DTS_E_IDNOTINPUTNOROUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6810">DTS_E_IDNOTINPUTNOROUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6811">ID %1!lu! は入力 ID でも出力 ID でもありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6811">The ID, %1!lu!, is neither an input ID nor an output ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6812">指定された ID は、外部メタデータのコレクションが関連付けられている入力 ID または出力 ID である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6812">The specified ID must be the input ID or the output ID that the external metadata collection is associated with.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6813">0xC020402C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6813">0xC020402C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6814">-1071628244</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6814">-1071628244</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6815">DTS_E_METADATACOLLECTIONNOTUSED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6815">DTS_E_METADATACOLLECTIONNOTUSED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6816">"%1" の外部メタデータのコレクションは、使用しないように設定されています。そのため、実行できる操作がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6816">The external metadata collection on "%1" is marked as not used, so no operations can be performed on it.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6817">0xC020402D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6817">0xC020402D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6818">-1071628243</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6818">-1071628243</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6819">DTS_E_NOBUFFERTYPEONSYNCOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6819">DTS_E_NOBUFFERTYPEONSYNCOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6820">%1 は同期出力なので、同期出力のバッファーの種類を取得できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6820">The %1 is a synchronous output and the buffer type cannot be retrieved for a synchronous output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6821">0xC0207000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6821">0xC0207000</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6822">-1071616000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6822">-1071616000</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6823">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNUSAGETYPENOTREADONLY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6823">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNUSAGETYPENOTREADONLY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6824">入力列 "%1" は読み取り専用にする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6824">The input column "%1" must be read-only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6825">入力列が、許可されていない読み取り専用以外の種類の使用法になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6825">The input column has a usage type other than read-only, which is not allowed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6826">0xC0207001</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6826">0xC0207001</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6827">-1071615999</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6827">-1071615999</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6828">DTS_E_MISSINGCUSTOMPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6828">DTS_E_MISSINGCUSTOMPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6829">要求されたプロパティ "%2" は "%1" にありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6829">The "%1" is missing the required property "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6830">このオブジェクトには、ここで示されたカスタム プロパティが必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6830">The object is required to have the specified custom property.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6831">0xC0207002</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6831">0xC0207002</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6832">-1071615998</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6832">-1071615998</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6833">DTS_E_ILLEGALCUSTOMOUTPUTPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6833">DTS_E_ILLEGALCUSTOMOUTPUTPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6834">出力 %1 ではプロパティ "%2" を使用できませんが、現在はこのプロパティが割り当てられています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6834">The output %1 cannot not have property "%2", but currently has that property assigned.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6835">0xC0207003</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6835">0xC0207003</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6836">-1071615997</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6836">-1071615997</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6837">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTEXCLUSIONGROUP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6837">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTEXCLUSIONGROUP</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6838">%1 は、除外グループ %2!d! に存在する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6838">The %1 must be in exclusion group %2!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6839">すべての出力は、この除外グループに存在する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6839">All outputs must be in the specified exclusion group.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6840">0xC0207004</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6840">0xC0207004</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6841">-1071615996</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6841">-1071615996</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6842">DTS_E_PROPERTYISEMPTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6842">DTS_E_PROPERTYISEMPTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6843">プロパティ "%1" が空です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6843">The property "%1" is empty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6844">プロパティを空にすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6844">The property cannot be empty.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6845">0xC0207005</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6845">0xC0207005</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6846">-1071615995</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6846">-1071615995</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6847">DTS_E_CREATEEXPRESSIONOBJECTFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6847">DTS_E_CREATEEXPRESSIONOBJECTFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6848">式 "%1" にメモリを割り当てられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6848">Memory cannot be allocated for the expression "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6849">式を保持する内部オブジェクトを作成中にメモリ不足になりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6849">There was an out-of-memory error while creating an internal object to hold the expression.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6850">0xC0207006</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6850">0xC0207006</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6851">-1071615994</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6851">-1071615994</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6852">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONPARSEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6852">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONPARSEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6853">式 "%1" を解析できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6853">Cannot parse the expression "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6854">式が無効であったか、メモリが不足しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6854">The expression was not valid, or there is an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6855">0xC0207007</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6855">0xC0207007</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6856">-1071615993</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6856">-1071615993</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6857">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6857">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6858">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、式 "%1" を計算できませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6858">Computing the expression "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6859">式に、解析時に検出できなかった 0 除算などのエラーが含まれているか、メモリが不足している可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6859">The expression may have errors, such as divide by zero, that cannot be detected at parse time, or there may be an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6860">0xC0207008</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6860">0xC0207008</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6861">-1071615992</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6861">-1071615992</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6862">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONARRAY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6862">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONARRAY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6863">式オブジェクトにメモリを割り当てられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6863">Memory cannot be allocated for the Expression objects.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6864">式オブジェクト ポインターの配列を作成中にメモリ不足になりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6864">An out-of-memory error occurred while creating the array of Expression object pointers.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6865">0xC020700A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6865">0xC020700A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6866">-1071615990</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6866">-1071615990</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6867">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONMANANGER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6867">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONMANANGER</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6868">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6868">The %1 failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6869">式マネージャーの作成中に %1 に失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6869">while creating the Expression Manager.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6870">0xC020700B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6870">0xC020700B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6871">-1071615989</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6871">-1071615989</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6872">DTS_E_SPLITEXPRESSIONNOTBOOLEAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6872">DTS_E_SPLITEXPRESSIONNOTBOOLEAN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6873">式 "%1" はブール式ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6873">The expression "%1" is not Boolean.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6874">この式の結果は、ブール型になる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6874">The result type of the expression must be Boolean.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6875">0xC020700C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6875">0xC020700C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6876">-1071615988</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6876">-1071615988</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6877">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONVALIDATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6877">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONVALIDATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6878">"%2" の式 "%1" が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6878">The expression "%1" on "%2" is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6879">0xC020700E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6879">0xC020700E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6880">-1071615986</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6880">-1071615986</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6881">DTS_E_COLUMNNOTMATCHED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6881">DTS_E_COLUMNNOTMATCHED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6882">列 "%1" (%2!d!) が、入力ファイルのどの列とも一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6882">The column "%1" (%2!d!) cannot be matched to any input file column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6883">出力列名または入力列名が、ファイル内に見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6883">The output column name or input column name cannot be found in the file.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6884">0xC020700F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6884">0xC020700F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6885">-1071615985</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6885">-1071615985</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6886">DTS_E_SETRESULTCOLUMNFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6886">DTS_E_SETRESULTCOLUMNFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6887">エラー コード 0x%3!8.8X! により、式 "%1" の結果列を %2 に設定できませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6887">Attempting to set the result column for the expression "%1" on %2 failed with error code 0x%3!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6888">この式の結果を受け取る予定であった入力列または出力列を判断できないか、列の型にこの式の結果をキャストできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6888">The input or output column that was to receive the result of the expression cannot be determined, or the expression result cannot be cast to the column type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6889">0xC0207011</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6889">0xC0207011</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6890">-1071615983</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6890">-1071615983</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6891">DTS_E_FAILEDTOGETLOCALEIDFROMPACKAGE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6891">DTS_E_FAILEDTOGETLOCALEIDFROMPACKAGE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6892">%1 はパッケージからロケール ID を取得できませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6892">The %1 failed to get the locale ID from the package.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6893">0xC0207012</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6893">0xC0207012</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6894">-1071615982</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6894">-1071615982</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6895">DTS_E_INCORRECTPARAMETERMAPPINGFORMAT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6895">DTS_E_INCORRECTPARAMETERMAPPINGFORMAT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6896">パラメーター マッピング文字列の形式が正しくありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6896">The parameter mapping string is not in the correct format.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6897">0xC0207013</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6897">0xC0207013</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6898">-1071615981</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6898">-1071615981</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6899">DTS_E_NOTENOUGHPARAMETERSPROVIDED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6899">DTS_E_NOTENOUGHPARAMETERSPROVIDED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6900">SQL コマンドには %1!d! 個の</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6900">The SQL command requires %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6901">パラメーターが必要ですが、パラメーター マッピングには %2!d! 個の</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6901">parameters, but the parameter mapping only has %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6902">%2!d! です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6902">parameters.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6903">0xC0207014</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6903">0xC0207014</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6904">-1071615980</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6904">-1071615980</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6905">DTS_E_PARAMETERNOTFOUNDINMAPPING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6905">DTS_E_PARAMETERNOTFOUNDINMAPPING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6906">SQL コマンドには "%1" という名前のパラメーターが必要ですが、パラメーター マッピングに見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6906">The SQL command requires a parameter named "%1", which is not found in the parameter mapping.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6907">0xC0207015</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6907">0xC0207015</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6908">-1071615979</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6908">-1071615979</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6909">DTS_E_DUPLICATEDATASOURCECOLUMNNAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6909">DTS_E_DUPLICATEDATASOURCECOLUMNNAME</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6910">名前 "%1" のデータ ソース列が複数あります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6910">There is more than one data source column with the name "%1".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6911">データ ソース列の名前は一意である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6911">The data source column names must be unique.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6912">0xC0207016</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6912">0xC0207016</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6913">-1071615978</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6913">-1071615978</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6914">DTS_E_DATASOURCECOLUMNWITHNONAMEFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6914">DTS_E_DATASOURCECOLUMNWITHNONAMEFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6915">名前が指定されていないデータ ソース列があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6915">There is a data source column with no name.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6916">各データ ソース列には名前を付ける必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6916">Each data source column must have a name.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6917">0xC0208001</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6917">0xC0208001</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6918">-1071611903</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6918">-1071611903</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6919">DTS_E_DISCONNECTEDCOMPONENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6919">DTS_E_DISCONNECTEDCOMPONENT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6920">コンポーネントがレイアウトから切断されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6920">A component is disconnected from the layout.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6921">0xC0208002</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6921">0xC0208002</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6922">-1071611902</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6922">-1071611902</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6923">DTS_E_INVALIDCOMPONENTID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6923">DTS_E_INVALIDCOMPONENTID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6924">レイアウト コンポーネントの ID が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6924">The ID for a layout component is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6925">0xC0208003</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6925">0xC0208003</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6926">-1071611901</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6926">-1071611901</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6927">DTS_E_INVALIDINPUTCOUNT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6927">DTS_E_INVALIDINPUTCOUNT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6928">コンポーネントの入力数が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6928">A component has an invalid number of inputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6929">0xC0208004</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6929">0xC0208004</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6930">-1071611900</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6930">-1071611900</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6931">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTCOUNT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6931">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTCOUNT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6932">コンポーネントの出力数が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6932">A component has an invalid number of outputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6933">0xC0208005</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6933">0xC0208005</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6934">-1071611899</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6934">-1071611899</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6935">DTS_E_NOINPUTSOROUTPUTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6935">DTS_E_NOINPUTSOROUTPUTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6936">コンポーネントに入力または出力がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6936">A component does not have any inputs or outputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6937">0xC0208007</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6937">0xC0208007</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6938">-1071611897</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6938">-1071611897</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6939">DTS_E_CANTALLOCATECOLUMNINFO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6939">DTS_E_CANTALLOCATECOLUMNINFO</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6940">メモリ不足のため、このコンポーネントで操作されている列の一覧を割り当てることができませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6940">Not enough memory was available to allocate a list of the columns that are being manipulated by this component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6941">0xC0208008</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6941">0xC0208008</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6942">-1071611896</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6942">-1071611896</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6943">DTS_E_OUTPUTCOLUMNNOTININPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6943">DTS_E_OUTPUTCOLUMNNOTININPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6944">出力列 "%1" (%2!d!) は、系列 ID が %3!d! の入力列を参照しますが、その系列 ID が指定された入力が見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6944">Output column "%1" (%2!d!) references input column with lineage ID %3!d!, but no input could be found with that lineage ID.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6945">0xC0208009</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6945">0xC0208009</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6946">-1071611895</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6946">-1071611895</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6947">DTS_E_SORTNEEDSONEKEY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6947">DTS_E_SORTNEEDSONEKEY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6948">少なくとも 1 つの入力列が並べ替えキーとして設定されている必要がありますが、キーが見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6948">At least one input column must be marked as a sort key, but no keys were found.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6949">0xC020800A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6949">0xC020800A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6950">-1071611894</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6950">-1071611894</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6951">DTS_E_SORTDUPLICATEKEYWEIGHT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6951">DTS_E_SORTDUPLICATEKEYWEIGHT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6952">列 "%1" (%2!d!) と列 "%3" (%4!d!) はどちらも並べ替えキーの加重値 %5!d! が設定されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6952">Both column "%1" (%2!d!) and column "%3" (%4!d!) were marked with sort key weight %5!d!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6953">0xC020800D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6953">0xC020800D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6954">-1071611891</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6954">-1071611891</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6955">DTS_E_CANTMODIFYINVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6955">DTS_E_CANTMODIFYINVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6956">この検証問題が解決されるまでは、このコンポーネントで要求されたメタデータの変更を実行できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6956">The component cannot perform the requested metadata change until the validation problem is fixed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6957">0xC020800E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6957">0xC020800E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6958">-1071611890</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6958">-1071611890</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6959">DTS_E_CANTADDINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6959">DTS_E_CANTADDINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6960">入力のコレクションに入力を追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6960">An input cannot be added to the inputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6961">0xC020800F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6961">0xC020800F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6962">-1071611889</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6962">-1071611889</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6963">DTS_E_CANTADDOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6963">DTS_E_CANTADDOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6964">出力のコレクションに出力を追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6964">An output cannot be added to the outputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6965">0xC0208010</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6965">0xC0208010</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6966">-1071611888</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6966">-1071611888</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6967">DTS_E_CANTDELETEINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6967">DTS_E_CANTDELETEINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6968">入力のコレクションから入力を削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6968">An input cannot be deleted from the inputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6969">0xC0208011</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6969">0xC0208011</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6970">-1071611887</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6970">-1071611887</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6971">DTS_E_CANTDELETEOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6971">DTS_E_CANTDELETEOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6972">出力のコレクションから出力を削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6972">An output cannot be removed from the outputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6973">0xC0208014</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6973">0xC0208014</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6974">-1071611884</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6974">-1071611884</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6975">DTS_E_CANTCHANGEUSAGETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6975">DTS_E_CANTCHANGEUSAGETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6976">列の使用法の種類を変更できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6976">The usage type of the column cannot be changed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6977">0xC0208016</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6977">0xC0208016</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6978">-1071611882</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6978">-1071611882</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6979">DTS_E_INVALIDUSAGETYPEFORCUSTOMPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6979">DTS_E_INVALIDUSAGETYPEFORCUSTOMPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6980">カスタム プロパティ "%2" を使用するには、%1 を読み取り/書き込みに設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6980">The %1 must be read/write to have custom property "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6981">入力列または出力列にはこのカスタム プロパティが存在しますが、読み取り/書き込みではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6981">The input or output column has the specified custom property, but is not read/write.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6982">プロパティを削除するか、この列を読み取り/書き込みに設定してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6982">Remove the property, or make the column read/write.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6983">0xC0208017</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6983">0xC0208017</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6984">-1071611881</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6984">-1071611881</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6985">DTS_E_READWRITECOLUMNMISSINGREQUIREDCUSTOMPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6985">DTS_E_READWRITECOLUMNMISSINGREQUIREDCUSTOMPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6986">%1 には、読み取り/書き込みが設定されているので、カスタム プロパティ "%2" が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6986">The %1 is read/write and is required to have custom property "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6987">プロパティを追加するか、列から読み取り/書き込み属性を削除してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6987">Add the property, or make remove the read/write attribute from the column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6988">0xC0208018</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6988">0xC0208018</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6989">-1071611880</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6989">-1071611880</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6990">DTS_E_CANTDELETECOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6990">DTS_E_CANTDELETECOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6991">列を削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6991">The column cannot be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-6992">このコンポーネントでは、この入力または出力から列を削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6992">The component does not allow columns to be deleted from this input or output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6993">0xC0208019</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6993">0xC0208019</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6994">-1071611879</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6994">-1071611879</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6995">DTS_E_CANTADDCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6995">DTS_E_CANTADDCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6996">このコンポーネントでは、この入力または出力に列を追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6996">The component does not allow adding columns to this input or output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6997">0xC020801A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6997">0xC020801A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6998">-1071611878</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6998">-1071611878</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-6999">DTS_E_CANNOTTFINDRUNTIMECONNECTIONOBJECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-6999">DTS_E_CANNOTTFINDRUNTIMECONNECTIONOBJECT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7000">接続 "%1" が見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7000">The connection "%1" cannot be found.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7001">接続マネージャーに、同じ名前の接続が存在することを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7001">Verify that the connection manager has a connection with that name.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7002">0xC020801B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7002">0xC020801B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7003">-1071611877</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7003">-1071611877</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7004">DTS_E_CANNOTFINDRUNTIMECONNECTIONMANAGER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7004">DTS_E_CANNOTFINDRUNTIMECONNECTIONMANAGER</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7005">ID "%1" のランタイム接続マネージャーが見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7005">The runtime connection manager with the ID "%1" cannot be found.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7006">接続マネージャー コレクションに、同じ ID の接続マネージャーが存在することを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7006">Verify that the connection manager collection has a connection manager with that ID.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7007">0xC020801C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7007">0xC020801C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7008">-1071611876</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7008">-1071611876</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7009">DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIRECONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7009">DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIRECONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7010">SSIS エラー コード DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIRECONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7010">SSIS Error Code DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIRECONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7011">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、接続マネージャー "%1" に対する AcquireConnection メソッドの呼び出しが失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7011">The AcquireConnection method call to the connection manager "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7012">このエラーの前に、AcquireConnection メソッドの呼び出しが失敗した理由の詳細が記載されたエラー メッセージが報告されている可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7012">There may be error messages posted before this with more information on why the AcquireConnection method call failed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7013">0xC020801D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7013">0xC020801D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7014">-1071611875</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7014">-1071611875</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7015">DTS_E_ACQUIREDCONNECTIONISINVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7015">DTS_E_ACQUIREDCONNECTIONISINVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7016">接続マネージャー "%1" から取得した接続は無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7016">The connection acquired from the connection manager "%1" is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7017">0xC020801E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7017">0xC020801E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7018">-1071611874</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7018">-1071611874</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7019">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONMANAGERTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7019">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONMANAGERTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7020">接続マネージャー "%1" は種類が正しくありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7020">The connection manager "%1" is an incorrect type.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7021">必要な種類は "%2" です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7021">The type required is "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7022">コンポーネントに使用できる種類は "%3" です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7022">The type available to the component is "%3".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7023">0xC020801F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7023">0xC020801F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7024">-1071611873</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7024">-1071611873</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7025">DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIREMANAGEDCONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7025">DTS_E_CANNOTACQUIREMANAGEDCONNECTIONFROMCONNECTIONMANAGER</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7026">ランタイム接続マネージャーからマネージド接続を取得できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7026">Cannot acquire a managed connection from the run-time connection manager.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7027">0xC0208020</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7027">0xC0208020</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7028">-1071611872</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7028">-1071611872</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7029">DTS_E_CANTINITINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7029">DTS_E_CANTINITINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7030">入力のコレクションを初期化するために入力を作成できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7030">An input cannot be created to initialize the inputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7031">0xC0208021</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7031">0xC0208021</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7032">-1071611871</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7032">-1071611871</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7033">DTS_E_CANTINITOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7033">DTS_E_CANTINITOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7034">出力のコレクションを初期化するために出力を作成できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7034">An output cannot be created to initialize the outputs collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7035">0xC0208023</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7035">0xC0208023</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7036">-1071611869</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7036">-1071611869</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7037">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTWRITE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7037">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTWRITE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7038">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、ファイル "%1" に書き込めませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7038">Writing to the file "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7039">0xC0208024</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7039">0xC0208024</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7040">-1071611868</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7040">-1071611868</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7041">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONOBJECTTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7041">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONOBJECTTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7042">接続マネージャー "%1" によって、AcquireConnection メソッドから種類の正しくないオブジェクトが返されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7042">The connection manager "%1" returned an object of an  incorrect type from the AcquireConnection method.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7043">0xC0208025</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7043">0xC0208025</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7044">-1071611867</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7044">-1071611867</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7045">DTS_E_INPUTCOLPROPERTYNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7045">DTS_E_INPUTCOLPROPERTYNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7046">入力列 "%1" (%2!d!) の "%3" プロパティが要求されましたが、見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7046">The "%3" property is required on input column "%1" (%2!d!), but is not found.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7047">見つからないプロパティを追加してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7047">The missing property should be added.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7048">0xC0208026</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7048">0xC0208026</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7049">-1071611866</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7049">-1071611866</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7050">DTS_E_EXTRACTORUNREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7050">DTS_E_EXTRACTORUNREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7051">"%1" は読み取り専用に設定されていますが、他のどの列からも参照されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7051">The "%1" is marked read-only, but is not referenced by any other column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7052">参照されていない列は許可されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7052">Unreferenced columns are not allowed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7053">0xC0208027</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7053">0xC0208027</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7054">-1071611865</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7054">-1071611865</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7055">DTS_E_EXTRACTORREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7055">DTS_E_EXTRACTORREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7056">"%1" は列 ID %2!d! を参照していますが、この列は入力にありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7056">The "%1" references column ID %2!d!, and that column is not found on the input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7057">存在しない列を参照しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7057">A reference points to a nonexistent column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7058">0xC0208028</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7058">0xC0208028</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7059">-1071611864</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7059">-1071611864</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7060">DTS_E_EXTRACTORDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7060">DTS_E_EXTRACTORDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7061">"%1" は "%2" を参照していますが、この列は BLOB 型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7061">The "%1" references "%2", and that column is not of a BLOB type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7062">0xC0208029</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7062">0xC0208029</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7063">-1071611863</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7063">-1071611863</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7064">DTS_E_INSERTERREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7064">DTS_E_INSERTERREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7065">"%1" は ID が %2!d! の出力列を参照していますが、この列は出力にありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7065">The "%1" references output column ID %2!d!, and that column is not found on the output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7066">0xC020802A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7066">0xC020802A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7067">-1071611862</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7067">-1071611862</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7068">DTS_E_INSERTERCANTREAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7068">DTS_E_INSERTERCANTREAD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7069">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、ファイル "%1" から読み取れませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7069">Reading from the file "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7070">0xC020802B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7070">0xC020802B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7071">-1071611861</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7071">-1071611861</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7072">DTS_E_TXSCD_NOTYPEDCOLUMNSATINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7072">DTS_E_TXSCD_NOTYPEDCOLUMNSATINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7073">緩やかに変化するディメンション変換では、入力の種類が固定属性、変化する属性、または履歴属性である列が少なくとも 1 列必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7073">There must be at least one column of Fixed, Changing, or Historical type on the input of a Slowly Changing Dimension transform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7074">少なくとも 1 つの列が FixedAttribute、ChangingAttribute、または HistoricalAttribute であることを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7074">Verify that at least one column is a FixedAttribute, ChangingAttribute, or HistoricalAttribute.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7075">0xC020802C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7075">0xC020802C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7076">-1071611860</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7076">-1071611860</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7077">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDINPUTCOLUMNTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7077">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDINPUTCOLUMNTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7078">"%1" の ColumnType プロパティが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7078">The ColumnType property of "%1" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7079">現在の値が、許容される値の範囲内にありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7079">The current value is outside the range of acceptable values.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7080">0xC020802D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7080">0xC020802D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7081">-1071611859</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7081">-1071611859</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7082">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTMAPDIFFERENTTYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7082">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTMAPDIFFERENTTYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7083">入力列 "%1" を外部列 "%2" にマップできません。列のデータ型が異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7083">The input column "%1" cannot be mapped to external column "%2" because they have different data types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7084">緩やかに変化するディメンション変換では、DT_STR および DT_WSTR 以外の型の列間でマッピングを行えません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7084">The Slowly Changing Dimension transform does not allow mapping between column of different types except for DT_STR and DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7085">0xC020802E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7085">0xC020802E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7086">-1071611858</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7086">-1071611858</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7087">DTS_E_NTEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHANSIFILES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7087">DTS_E_NTEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHANSIFILES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7088">"%1" のデータ型は DT_NTEXT ですが、この型は ANSI 形式のファイルではサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7088">The data type for "%1" is DT_NTEXT, which is not supported with ANSI files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7089">代わりに、DT_TEXT 型を使用し、データ変換コンポーネントでデータを DT_NTEXT 型に変換してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7089">Use DT_TEXT instead and convert the data to DT_NTEXT using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7090">0xC020802F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7090">0xC020802F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7091">-1071611857</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7091">-1071611857</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7092">DTS_E_TEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHUNICODEFILES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7092">DTS_E_TEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHUNICODEFILES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7093">"%1" のデータ型は DT_TEXT ですが、この型は Unicode 形式のファイルではサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7093">The data type for "%1" is DT_TEXT, which is not supported with Unicode files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7094">代わりに、DT_NTEXT 型を使用し、データ変換コンポーネントでデータを DT_TEXT 型に変換してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7094">Use DT_NTEXT instead and convert the data to DT_TEXT using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7095">0xC0208030</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7095">0xC0208030</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7096">-1071611856</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7096">-1071611856</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7097">DTS_E_IMAGEDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7097">DTS_E_IMAGEDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7098">"%1" のデータ型は DT_IMAGE ですが、この型はサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7098">The data type for "%1" is DT_IMAGE, which is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7099">代わりに、DT_TEXT 型または DT_NTEXT 型を使用し、データ変換コンポーネントでデータを DT_IMAGE 型との間で変換してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7099">Use DT_TEXT or DT_NTEXT instead and convert the data from, or to, DT_IMAGE using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7100">0xC0208031</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7100">0xC0208031</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7101">-1071611855</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7101">-1071611855</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7102">DTS_E_FLATFILEFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7102">DTS_E_FLATFILEFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7103">形式 "%1" はフラット ファイル接続マネージャーでサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7103">Format "%1" is not supported by Flat File Connection Manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7104">サポートされている形式は、Delimited、FixedWidth、RaggedRight、および Mixed です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7104">Supported formats are Delimited, FixedWidth, RaggedRight, and Mixed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7105">0xC0208032</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7105">0xC0208032</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7106">-1071611854</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7106">-1071611854</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7107">DTS_E_EXTRACTORFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7107">DTS_E_EXTRACTORFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7108">"%1" にはファイル名を含める必要がありますが、文字列型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7108">The "%1" should contain a file name, but it is not of a String type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7109">0xC0208033</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7109">0xC0208033</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7110">-1071611853</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7110">-1071611853</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7111">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTAPPENDTRUNCATE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7111">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTAPPENDTRUNCATE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7112">プロパティ設定の競合により、エラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7112">Error caused by conflicting property settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7113">"%1" では、AllowAppend プロパティと ForceTruncate プロパティの両方が True に設定されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7113">The "%1" has both the AllowAppend property and the ForceTruncate property set to TRUE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7114">両方のプロパティを True に設定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7114">Both properties cannot be set to TRUE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7115">2 つのプロパティのいずれかを False に設定してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7115">Set one of the two properties to FALSE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7116">0xC0208034</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7116">0xC0208034</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7117">-1071611852</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7117">-1071611852</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7118">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7118">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7119">%1 は列 ID %2!d! を参照していますが、この列は既に %3 が参照しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7119">The %1 references column ID %2!d!, but that column is already referenced by %3.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7120">列への 2 つの参照のうち、いずれかを削除してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7120">Remove one of the two reference to the column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7121">0xC0208035</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7121">0xC0208035</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7122">-1071611851</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7122">-1071611851</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7123">DTS_E_CONNECTIONMANANGERNOTASSIGNED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7123">DTS_E_CONNECTIONMANANGERNOTASSIGNED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7124">%1 に接続マネージャーが割り当てられていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7124">A connection manager has not been assigned to the %1.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7125">0xC0208036</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7125">0xC0208036</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7126">-1071611850</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7126">-1071611850</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7127">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7127">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7128">%1 は ID が %2!d! の出力列を参照していますが、この列は既に %3 が参照しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7128">The %1 references the output column with ID %2!d!, but that column is already referenced by %3.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7129">0xC0208037</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7129">0xC0208037</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7130">-1071611849</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7130">-1071611849</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7131">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNNOTREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7131">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNNOTREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7132">"%1" はどの入力列からも参照されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7132">The "%1" is not referenced by any input column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7133">各出力列は、1 つの入力列によって参照される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7133">Each output column must be referenced by exactly one input column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7134">0xC0208038</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7134">0xC0208038</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7135">-1071611848</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7135">-1071611848</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7136">DTS_E_INSERTERDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7136">DTS_E_INSERTERDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7137">"%1" は "%2" を参照していますが、この列は型が正しくありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7137">The "%1" references "%2", and that column is not the correct type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7138">DT_TEXT、DT_NTEXT、DT_IMAGE のいずれかにする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7138">It must be DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT, or DT_IMAGE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7139">BLOB である必要がある列を参照しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7139">A reference points to a column that must be a BLOB.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7140">0xC0208039</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7140">0xC0208039</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7141">-1071611847</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7141">-1071611847</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7142">DTS_E_INSERTERFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7142">DTS_E_INSERTERFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7143">"%1" にはファイル名を含める必要がありますが、文字列型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7143">The "%1" should contain a file name, but it is not a String type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7144">0xC020803A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7144">0xC020803A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7145">-1071611846</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7145">-1071611846</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7146">DTS_E_INSERTEREXPECTBOMINVALIDTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7146">DTS_E_INSERTEREXPECTBOMINVALIDTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7147">"%1" では %2 の ExpectBOM プロパティが True に設定されていますが、この列は NT_NTEXT 型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7147">The "%1" has the ExpectBOM property set to TRUE for %2, but the column is not NT_NTEXT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7148">ExpectBOM により、列インポート変換でバイト順マーク (BOM) が予期されることが示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7148">The ExpectBOM specifies that the Import Column transformation expects a byte-order mark (BOM).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7149">ExpectBOM プロパティを False に設定するか、出力列のデータ型を DT_NTEXT に変更してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7149">Either set the ExpectBOM property to false or change the output column data type to DT_NTEXT.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7150">0xC020803B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7150">0xC020803B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7151">-1071611845</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7151">-1071611845</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7152">DTS_E_INSERTERINVALIDDATACOLUMNSETTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7152">DTS_E_INSERTERINVALIDDATACOLUMNSETTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7153">データ出力列には、DT_TEXT、DT_NTEXT、または DT_IMAGE を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7153">Data output columns must be DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT, or DT_IMAGE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7154">データ出力列は BLOB 型にのみ設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7154">The data output column may only be set to a BLOB type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7155">0xC020803C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7155">0xC020803C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7156">-1071611844</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7156">-1071611844</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7157">DTS_E_TXSCD_FIXEDATTRIBUTECHANGE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7157">DTS_E_TXSCD_FIXEDATTRIBUTECHANGE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7158">FailOnFixedAttributeChange プロパティが True に設定されている場合、固定属性の変更が検出されると変換が行われません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7158">If the FailOnFixedAttributeChange property is set to TRUE, the transformation will fail when a fixed attribute change is detected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7159">行を固定属性の出力に送信するには、FailOnFixedAttributeChange プロパティを False に設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7159">To send rows to the Fixed Attribute output, set the FailOnFixedAttributeChange property to FALSE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7160">0xC020803D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7160">0xC020803D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7161">-1071611843</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7161">-1071611843</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7162">DTS_E_TXSCD_LOOKUPFAILURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7162">DTS_E_TXSCD_LOOKUPFAILURE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7163">参照変換で行を取得できませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7163">The Lookup transformation failed to retrieve any rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7164">FailOnLookupFailure が True に設定されている場合は、変換が行われず、行が取得されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7164">The transform fails when the FailOnLookupFailure is set to TRUE and no rows are retrieved.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7165">0xC020803E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7165">0xC020803E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7166">-1071611842</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7166">-1071611842</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7167">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDNUMBERSOFPARAMETERS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7167">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDNUMBERSOFPARAMETERS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7168">緩やかに変化するディメンション変換では、入力列の種類がキーである列が少なくとも 1 列必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7168">There must be at least one column type of Key on the input of a Slowly Changing Dimension transformation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7169">少なくとも 1 列の種類をキーに設定してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7169">Set at least one column type to Key.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7170">0xC020803F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7170">0xC020803F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7171">-1071611841</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7171">-1071611841</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7172">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTFINDEXTERNALCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7172">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTFINDEXTERNALCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7173">名前 "%1" の外部列が見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7173">Cannot find external column with name "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7174">0xC0208040</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7174">0xC0208040</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7175">-1071611840</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7175">-1071611840</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7176">DTS_E_TXSCD_INFFEREDINDICATORNOTBOOL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7176">DTS_E_TXSCD_INFFEREDINDICATORNOTBOOL</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7177">推定インジケーター列 "%1" の型は DT_BOOL である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7177">Inferred indicator column "%1" must be of type DT_BOOL.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7178">0xC0208107</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7178">0xC0208107</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7179">-1071611641</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7179">-1071611641</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7180">DTS_E_ERRORROWDISPMUSTBENOTUSED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7180">DTS_E_ERRORROWDISPMUSTBENOTUSED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7181">%1 は、エラー行の処理の値を RD_NotUsed に設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7181">The %1 must have its error row disposition value set to RD_NotUsed.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7295">0xC020821A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7295">0xC020821A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7296">-1071611366</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7296">-1071611366</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7297">DTS_E_QUEUEWORKITEMFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7297">DTS_E_QUEUEWORKITEMFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7298">並べ替え変換では、作業項目をスレッド プールのキューに登録できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7298">The Sort transformation cannot queue a work item to its thread pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7299">メモリが不足しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7299">There is not enough memory available.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7378">0xC0208234</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7378">0xC0208234</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7379">-1071611340</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7379">-1071611340</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7380">DTS_E_UNABLETOLOCATEINPUTCOLUMNID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7380">DTS_E_UNABLETOLOCATEINPUTCOLUMNID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7381">位置番号 %2!d! のパラメーターの ParameterMap カスタム プロパティで参照される系列 ID %1!d! の入力列が入力列のコレクションに見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7381">An input column with the lineage ID %1!d!, referenced in the ParameterMap custom property with the parameter on position number %2!d!, cannot be found in the input columns collection.</span></span>|
