|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7695">0xC02082F9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7695">0xC02082F9</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7696">-1071611143</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7696">-1071611143</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7697">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTKATAKANAHIRAGANA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7697">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTKATAKANAHIRAGANA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7698">列 "%1" で、カタカナ文字列とひらがな文字列を同時に生成するように要求しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7698">Column "%1" requests that Katakana and Hiragana characters be produced at the same time.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7699">0xC02082FA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7699">0xC02082FA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7700">-1071611142</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7700">-1071611142</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7701">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTSIMPLECOMPLEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7701">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTSIMPLECOMPLEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7702">列 "%1" で、簡体中国語と繁体中国語を同時に生成するように要求しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7702">Column "%1" requests that Simple Chinese and Traditional Chinese characters be produced at the same time.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7703">0xC02082FB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7703">0xC02082FB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7704">-1071611141</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7704">-1071611141</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7705">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTFULLHALF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7705">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTFULLHALF</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7706">列 "%1" で、全角文字列と半角文字列の両方を生成する操作を要求しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7706">Column "%1" requests operations to generate both full width and half width characters.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7707">0xC02082FC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7707">0xC02082FC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7708">-1071611140</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7708">-1071611140</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7709">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCHINAJAPAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7709">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCHINAJAPAN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7710">列 "%1" で、日本語文字列での操作と中国語文字列での操作を組み合わせています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7710">Column "%1" combines operations on Japanese characters with operations for Chinese characters.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7711">0xC02082FD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7711">0xC02082FD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7712">-1071611139</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7712">-1071611139</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7713">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCASECHINESE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7713">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCASECHINESE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7714">列 "%1" で、中国語文字列の操作と、大文字および小文字の操作を組み合わせています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7714">Column "%1" combines operations on Chinese characters with uppercase and lowercase operations.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7715">0xC02082FE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7715">0xC02082FE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7716">-1071611138</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7716">-1071611138</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7717">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCASEJAPANESE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7717">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTCASEJAPANESE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7718">列 "%1" で、日本語文字列での操作と、大文字および小文字の操作を組み合わせています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7718">Column "%1" combines operations on Japanese characters with uppercase and lowercase operations.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7719">0xC02082FF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7719">0xC02082FF</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7720">-1071611137</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7720">-1071611137</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7721">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTBOTHCASE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7721">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTBOTHCASE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7722">列 "%1" で、この列が大文字と小文字の両方にマップされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7722">Column "%1" maps the column to both uppercase and lowercase.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7723">0xC0208300</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7723">0xC0208300</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7724">-1071611136</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7724">-1071611136</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7725">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTLINGUISTIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7725">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_CANTLINGUISTIC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7726">列 "%1" で、大文字と小文字以外のフラグと言語の文字種操作を組み合わせています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7726">Column "%1" combines flags other than uppercase and lowercase with the linguistic casing operation.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7727">0xC0208301</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7727">0xC0208301</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7728">-1071611135</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7728">-1071611135</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7729">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_INVALIDMAPFLAGANDDATATYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7729">DTS_E_TXCHARMAP_INVALIDMAPFLAGANDDATATYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7730">列 "%1" のデータ型を指定どおりにマップできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7730">The data type of column "%1" cannot be mapped as specified.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7731">0xC0208302</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7731">0xC0208302</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7732">-1071611134</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7732">-1071611134</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7734">既存の一致インデックス "%2" のバージョン (%1) はサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7734">The version (%1) of the pre-existing match index "%2" is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7735">予期していたバージョンは "%3" です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7735">The version expected is "%3".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7736">このエラーは、インデックス メタデータに保存されているバージョンが現在のコードが構築されたときのバージョンと一致しない場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7736">This error occurs if the version persisted in the index metadata does not match the version which the current code was built for.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7737">現在のバージョンのコードを使用してインデックスを再構築することで、エラーを修正してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7737">Fix the error by rebuilding the index with the current version of the code.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7738">0xC0208303</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7738">0xC0208303</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7739">-1071611133</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7739">-1071611133</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7741">テーブル "%1" は、構築済みの有効な一致インデックスではないようです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7741">The table "%1" does not appear to be a valid pre-built match index.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7742">このエラーは、メタデータ レコードを指定された構築済みのインデックスから読み込めない場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7742">This error occurs if the metadata record cannot be loaded from the specified pre-built index.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7743">0xC0208304</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7743">0xC0208304</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7744">-1071611132</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7744">-1071611132</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7746">指定された構築済みの一致インデックス "%1" を読み取れません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7746">Unable to read specified pre-built match index "%1".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7747">OLEDB エラー コード: 0x%2!8.8X!。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7747">OLEDB Error code: 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7748">0xC0208305</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7748">0xC0208305</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7749">-1071611131</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7749">-1071611131</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7751">参照テーブル列への有効な結合が指定された入力列はありませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7751">There were no input columns with a valid join to a reference table column.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7752">少なくとも 1 つの結合が、入力列プロパティ JoinToReferenceColumn および JoinType で定義されていることを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7752">Make sure that there is at least one join defined using the input column properties JoinToReferenceColumn and JoinType.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7753">0xC0208306</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7753">0xC0208306</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7754">-1071611130</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7754">-1071611130</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7756">指定された既存の一致インデックス "%1" は、もともと列 "%2" のあいまい一致情報を使用して構築されていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7756">The specified pre-existing match index "%1" was not originally built with fuzzy match information for column "%2".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7757">この情報を含めるために、既存の一致インデックスを再構築する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7757">It must be rebuilt to include this information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7758">このエラーは、インデックスがあいまい結合列以外の列を使用して構築された場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7758">This error occurs when the index was built with the column not being a fuzzy join column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7759">0xC0208307</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7759">0xC0208307</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7760">-1071611129</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7760">-1071611129</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7762">プロパティ "%2" に指定された名前 "%1" は、有効な SQL 識別子名ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7762">The name "%1" given for property "%2" is not a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7763">このエラーは、プロパティの名前が、有効な SQL 識別子名の仕様に準拠していない場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7763">This error occurs if the name for the property does not conform to the specifications for a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7764">0xC0208309</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7764">0xC0208309</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7765">-1071611127</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7765">-1071611127</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7767">あいまい参照変換の MinSimilarity しきい値プロパティには、0.0 以上かつ 1.0 未満の値を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7767">The MinSimilarity threshold property on the Fuzzy Lookup transformation must be a value greater than or equal to 0.0 but less than 1.0.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7768">0xC020830A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7768">0xC020830A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7769">-1071611126</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7769">-1071611126</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7771">プロパティ "%2" の値 "%1" が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7771">The value "%1" for property "%2" is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7772">0xC020830B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7772">0xC020830B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7773">-1071611125</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7773">-1071611125</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7775">あいまい結合は DT_STR 型と DT_WSTR 型の文字列間でのみサポートされているので、入力列 "%1" と参照列 "%2" の間に指定されているあいまい参照は無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7775">The fuzzy lookup specified between input column "%1" and reference column "%2" is not valid because fuzzy joins are only supported between string columns, types DT_STR and DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7776">0xC020830C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7776">0xC020830C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7777">-1071611124</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7777">-1071611124</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7779">完全な参照列 "%1" と "%2" のデータ型が同じでないか、比較可能な文字列型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7779">The exact lookup columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not comparable string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7780">完全結合は、列のデータ型が同一の場合、または DT_STR 型と DT_WSTR 型の組み合わせの場合にサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7780">Exact joins are supported between columns with equal data types or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7781">0xC020830D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7781">0xC020830D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7782">-1071611123</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7782">-1071611123</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7784">コピー列 "%1" と "%2" のデータ型が同じでないか、または普通に変換できる文字列型ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7784">The copy columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not trivially convertible string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7785">参照から出力へのコピーは、列のデータ型が同一の場合または DT_STR 型と DT_WSTR 型の組み合わせの場合にサポートされていますが、他のデータ型ではサポートされていません。このエラーは、このことが原因で発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7785">This occurs because copying from reference to output between columns with equal data types, or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination, is supported, but other types are not.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7786">0xC020830E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7786">0xC020830E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7787">-1071611122</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7787">-1071611122</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7789">パススルー列 "%1" と "%2" のデータ型が一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7789">The passthrough columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7790">入力から出力へのパススルー列としてサポートされているのは、データ型が一致する列のみです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7790">Only columns with equal data types are supported as passthrough columns from input to output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7791">0xC020830F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7791">0xC020830F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7792">-1071611121</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7792">-1071611121</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7794">参照列 "%1" が見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7794">Cannot locate reference column "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7795">0xC0208311</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7795">0xC0208311</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7796">-1071611119</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7796">-1071611119</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7798">出力列には、CopyColumn プロパティまたは PassThruColumn プロパティのいずれか 1 つだけが指定されている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7798">An output column must have exactly one CopyColumn or PassThruColumn property specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7799">このエラーは、CopyColumn プロパティおよび PassThruColumn プロパティのどちらにも空でない値が設定されていない場合、またはこれら両方のプロパティに空でない値が設定されている場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7799">This error occurs when neither the CopyColumn or the PassThruColumn properties, or both the CopyColumn and PassThruColumn properties, are set to non-empty values.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7800">0xC0208312</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7800">0xC0208312</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7801">-1071611118</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7801">-1071611118</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7803">出力列 '%3' でプロパティ '%2' に指定された変換元系列 ID '%1!d!' が</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7803">The source lineage id '%1!d!'</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7804">入力列のコレクションに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7804">specified for property '%2' on output column '%3' was not found in the input column collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7805">このエラーは、出力列にパススルー列として指定された入力列 ID が入力のセットに見つからない場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7805">This occurs when the input column id specified on an output column as a passthrough column is not found in the set of inputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7806">0xC0208313</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7806">0xC0208313</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7807">-1071611117</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7807">-1071611117</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7808">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEXED_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND_IN_REF_TABLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7808">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEXED_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND_IN_REF_TABLE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7809">構築済みのインデックス "%2" の列 "%1" が参照テーブルまたはクエリに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7809">The column "%1" in the pre-built index "%2" was not found in the reference table/query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7810">このエラーは、参照テーブルのスキーマまたはクエリが、既存の一致インデックスの構築後に変更された場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7810">This happens if the schema/query of the reference table has changed since the pre-existing match index was built.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7811">0xC0208314</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7811">0xC0208314</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7812">-1071611116</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7812">-1071611116</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7813">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TOKEN_TOO_LONG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7813">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TOKEN_TOO_LONG</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7814">コンポーネントで 2147483647 文字より大きいトークンが検出されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7814">The component encountered a token that was larger than 2147483647 characters.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7815">0xC0208315</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7815">0xC0208315</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7816">-1071611115</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7816">-1071611115</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7817">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7817">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7818">出力ファイルを追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7818">The output file cannot be appended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7819">列 "%1" の名前は一致していますが、出力ファイルの列の型は %2 で、入力列の型は %3 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7819">Column "%1" matches by name, but the column in the file has type %2 and the input column has type %3.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7820">列のメタデータのデータ型が一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7820">The metadata for the column does not match on data type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7821">0xC0208316</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7821">0xC0208316</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7822">-1071611114</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7822">-1071611114</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7823">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHSIZE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7823">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHSIZE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7824">出力ファイルを追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7824">The output file cannot be appended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7825">列 "%1" の名前は一致していますが、出力ファイルの列の最大長は %2!d! で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7825">Column "%1" matches by name, but the column in the file has maximum length %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7826">入力列の最大長は %3!d! です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7826">and the input column has maximum length %3!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7827">列のメタデータの長さが一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7827">The metadata for the column does not match in length.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7828">0xC0208317</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7828">0xC0208317</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7829">-1071611113</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7829">-1071611113</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7830">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHCODEPAGE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7830">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHCODEPAGE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7831">出力ファイルを追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7831">The output file cannot be appended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7832">列 "%1" の名前は一致していますが、出力ファイルの列のコード ページは %2!d! で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7832">Column "%1" matches by name, but the column in the file has code page %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7833">入力列のコード ページは %3!d! です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7833">and the input column has code page %3!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7834">指定された列のメタデータのコード ページが一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7834">The metadata for the named column does not match on code page.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7835">0xC0208318</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7835">0xC0208318</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7836">-1071611112</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7836">-1071611112</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7837">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHPRECISION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7837">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHPRECISION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7838">出力ファイルを追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7838">The output file cannot be appended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7839">列 "%1" の名前は一致していますが、出力ファイルの列の有効桁数は %2!d! で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7839">Column "%1" matches by name, but the column in the file has precision %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7840">入力列の有効桁数は %3!d! です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7840">and the input column has precision %3!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7841">指定された列のメタデータの有効桁数が一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7841">The metadata for the named column does not match on precision.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7842">0xC0208319</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7842">0xC0208319</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7843">-1071611111</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7843">-1071611111</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7844">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHSCALE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7844">DTS_E_RAWMETADATAMISMATCHSCALE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7845">出力ファイルを追加できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7845">The output file cannot be appended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7846">列 "%1" の名前は一致していますが、出力ファイルの列の小数点以下桁数は %2!d! で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7846">Column "%1" matches by name, but the column in the file has scale %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7847">入力列の小数点以下桁数は %3!d! です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7847">and the input column has scale %3!d!.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7848">指定された列のメタデータの小数点以下桁数が一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7848">The metadata for the named column does not match on scale.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7849">0xC020831A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7849">0xC020831A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7850">-1071611110</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7850">-1071611110</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7851">DTS_E_COULD_NOT_DETERMINE_DATASOURCE_DBMSNAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7851">DTS_E_COULD_NOT_DETERMINE_DATASOURCE_DBMSNAME</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7852">"%1" の DBMS 名とバージョンを特定できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7852">Unable to determine the DBMS name and version on "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7853">このエラーは、接続の IDBProperties によって、DBMS 名とバージョンを確認するのに必要な情報が返されなかった場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7853">This occurs if the IDBProperties on the connection did not return information needed to verify the DBMS name and version.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7854">0xC020831B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7854">0xC020831B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7855">-1071611109</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7855">-1071611109</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7856">DTS_E_INCORRECT_SQL_SERVER_VERSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7856">DTS_E_INCORRECT_SQL_SERVER_VERSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7857">"%1" の DBMS の種類またはバージョンは、サポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7857">The DBMS type or version of "%1" is not supported.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7858">Microsoft SQL Server Version 8.0 (2000) 以降への接続が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7858">A connection to Microsoft SQL Server version 8.0 or later is required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7859">このエラーは、接続の IDBProperties から正しいバージョンが返されなかった場合に発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7859">This occurs if IDBProperties on the connection did not return a the correct version.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7860">0xC020831D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7860">0xC020831D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7861">-1071611107</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7861">-1071611107</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7862">DTS_E_CANTDELETEERRORCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7862">DTS_E_CANTDELETEERRORCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7863">%1 は特殊なエラー出力列なので、削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7863">The %1 is a special error output column and cannot be deleted.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7864">0xC020831E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7864">0xC020831E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7865">-1071611106</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7865">-1071611106</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7866">DTS_E_UNEXPECTEDCOLUMNDATATYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7866">DTS_E_UNEXPECTEDCOLUMNDATATYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7867">列 "%1" に指定されたデータ型が予期された型 "%2" ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7867">The data type specified for column "%1" is not the expected type "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7868">0xC020831F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7868">0xC020831F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7869">-1071611105</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7869">-1071611105</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7870">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7870">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7871">出力列 "%3" でプロパティ "%2" によって参照されている入力列の系列 ID "%1" が入力列のコレクションに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7871">The input column lineage ID "%1" referenced by property "%2" on output column "%3" could not be located in the input column collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7872">0xC0208320</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7872">0xC0208320</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7873">-1071611104</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7873">-1071611104</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7874">DTS_E_TXGROUPDUPS_INPUTCOLUMNNOTJOINED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7874">DTS_E_TXGROUPDUPS_INPUTCOLUMNNOTJOINED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7875">出力列 "%3" でプロパティ "%2" によって参照されている入力列 "%1" には、プロパティ ToBeCleaned=True と有効な ExactFuzzy プロパティ値を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7875">The input column "%1" referenced by the "%2" property on output column "%3" must have property ToBeCleaned=True and have a valid ExactFuzzy property value.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7876">0xC0208322</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7876">0xC0208322</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7877">-1071611102</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7877">-1071611102</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7878">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_TABLE_MISSING_IDENTITY_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7878">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_TABLE_MISSING_IDENTITY_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7879">参照テーブル '%1' の整数型の ID 列にクラスター化インデックスがありません。クラスター化インデックスは、プロパティ 'CopyRefTable' が False に設定されている場合に必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7879">The reference table '%1' does not have a clustered index on an integer identity column, which is required if the property 'CopyRefTable' is set to FALSE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7880">CopyRefTable が False の場合、参照テーブルの整数型の ID 列にクラスター化インデックスが必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7880">If CopyRefTable is false, the reference table must have a clustered index on an integer identity column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7881">0xC0208323</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7881">0xC0208323</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7882">-1071611101</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7882">-1071611101</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7883">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_CONTAINS_NON_INTEGER_IDENT_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7883">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_CONTAINS_NON_INTEGER_IDENT_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7884">参照テーブル '%1' には整数型ではない ID 列が含まれていますが、それはサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7884">The reference table '%1' contains a non-integer type identity column which is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7885">列 '%2' を含まないテーブルのビューを使用してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7885">Use a view of the table without the column '%2'.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7886">このエラーは、コピーが参照テーブルで作成されているときに、整数型の ID 列が追加されますが、テーブルごとに 1 つの ID 列しか保持できないことが原因で発生します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7886">This error occurs  because when a copy is made of the reference table, an integer identity column is added, and only one identity column is allowed per table.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7887">0xC0208324</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7887">0xC0208324</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7888">-1071611100</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7888">-1071611100</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7889">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_MATCHCONTRIBUTION_AND_HIERARCHY_SPECIFIED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7889">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_MATCHCONTRIBUTION_AND_HIERARCHY_SPECIFIED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7890">MatchContribution と階層情報の両方を同時に指定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7890">Both MatchContribution and hierarchy information cannot be specified at the same time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7891">これらのプロパティはどちらもスコアに対する重み係数なので、許可されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7891">This is not allowed because these properties are both weighing factors for scoring.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7892">0xC0208325</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7892">0xC0208325</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7893">-1071611099</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7893">-1071611099</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7894">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_HIERARCHY_INCORRECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7894">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_HIERARCHY_INCORRECT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7895">階層内のレベルには一意の数字を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7895">Levels in hierarchy should be unique numbers .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7896">階層値の有効なレベルは 1 以上の整数です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7896">Valid  level in hierarchy values are integers greater than or equal to 1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7897">数値が小さくなるほど、階層の下位の列になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7897">The smaller the number is, the lower the column is in the hierarchy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7898">既定値は 0 で、列が階層の一部でないことを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7898">The default value is 0, indicating that the column is not part of a hierarchy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7899">レベルが重なり合ったり、レベル間にギャップがあることは許可されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7899">Overlaps and gaps are not allowed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7900">0xC0208326</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7900">0xC0208326</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7901">-1071611098</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7901">-1071611098</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7902">DTS_E_TXFUZZYGROUPING_INSUFFICIENT_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7902">DTS_E_TXFUZZYGROUPING_INSUFFICIENT_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7903">あいまいグループ化の対象となる列が定義されませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7903">No columns to fuzzy group on were defined.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7904">列プロパティ ToBeCleaned=true および ExactFuzzy=2 が設定された入力列が少なくとも 1 つ必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7904">There must be at least one input column with column properties ToBeCleaned=true and ExactFuzzy=2.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7905">0xC0208329</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7905">0xC0208329</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7906">-1071611095</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7906">-1071611095</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7907">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_COLUMNINVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7907">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_COLUMNINVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7908">何らかの理由により、ID '%1!d!' の列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7908">The column with ID '%1!d!'</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-7909">が有効ではありませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7909">was not valid for an undetermined reason.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7910">0xC020832A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7910">0xC020832A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7911">-1071611094</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7911">-1071611094</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7912">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTEDDATATYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7912">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTEDDATATYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7913">列 '%1' のデータ型はサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7913">The data type of column '%1' is not supported.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7914">0xC020832C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7914">0xC020832C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7915">-1071611092</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7915">-1071611092</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7916">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUTLENGTHMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7916">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUTLENGTHMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7917">出力列 '%1' の長さは、基になる列 '%2' の長さよりも短くなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7917">The length of output column '%1' is less than that of its source column '%2'.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7918">0xC020832F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7918">0xC020832F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7919">-1071611089</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7919">-1071611089</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7920">DTS_E_TERMEXTRACTION_INCORRECTEXACTNUMBEROFINPUTCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7920">DTS_E_TERMEXTRACTION_INCORRECTEXACTNUMBEROFINPUTCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-7921">入力列は 1 つだけ存在する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-7921">There should be only one input column.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8194">0xC020836F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8194">0xC020836F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8195">-1071611025</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8195">-1071611025</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8196">DTS_E_INVALIDBULKINSERTPROPERTYVALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8196">DTS_E_INVALIDBULKINSERTPROPERTYVALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8197">プロパティ %1 の値は %2!d! ですが、許可されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8197">The value for the property %1 is %2!d!, which is not allowed.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8198">値には、%3!d! 以上の値を指定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8198">The value must be greater than or equal to %3!d!.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8204">0xC0208371</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8204">0xC0208371</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8205">-1071611023</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8205">-1071611023</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8206">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPUNABLETODELETEEXISTINGMATCHINDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8206">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPUNABLETODELETEEXISTINGMATCHINDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8207">"%1" という名前の既存のあいまい一致インデックスを削除中にエラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8207">An error was encountered when trying to delete the existing fuzzy match index named "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8208">このテーブルはあいまい参照 (またはこのバージョンのあいまい参照) によって作成されなかったか、壊れているか、または別の問題がある可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8208">It is possible that this table was not created by Fuzzy Lookup (or this version of Fuzzy Lookup), it has been damaged, or there is another problem.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8209">"%2" という名前のテーブルを手動で削除するか、MatchIndexName プロパティに別の名前を指定してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8209">Try manually deleting the table named "%2" or specify a different name for the MatchIndexName property.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8210">0xC0208372</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8210">0xC0208372</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8211">-1071611022</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8211">-1071611022</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8212">DTS_E_TERMEXTRACTION_INCORRECTSCORETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8212">DTS_E_TERMEXTRACTION_INCORRECTSCORETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8213">変換のスコアの種類に設定できるのは、頻度または TFIDF のみです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8213">The Score Type of the transformation can only be Frequency or TFIDF.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8214">0xC0208373</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8214">0xC0208373</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8215">-1071611021</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8215">-1071611021</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8216">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPREFTABLETOOBIG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8216">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPREFTABLETOOBIG</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8217">指定された参照テーブルの行数が多すぎます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8217">The reference table specified has too many rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8218">あいまい参照は、10 億行未満の参照テーブルでのみ機能します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8218">Fuzzy Lookup only works with reference tables having less than 1 billion rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8219">参照テーブルで、より小さいビューを使用することを検討してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8219">Consider using a smaller view of your reference table.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8220">0xC0208374</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8220">0xC0208374</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8221">-1071611020</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8221">-1071611020</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8222">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPUNABLETODETERMINEREFERENCETABLESIZE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8222">DTS_E_FUZZYLOOKUPUNABLETODETERMINEREFERENCETABLESIZE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8223">参照テーブル '%1' のサイズを特定できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8223">Unable to determine the size of the reference table '%1'.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8224">このオブジェクトがビューであり、テーブルではない可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8224">It is possible that this object is a view and not a table.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8225">あいまい参照では、CopyReferentaceTable が False に設定されたビューをサポートしていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8225">Fuzzy Lookup does not support views when CopyReferentaceTable=false.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8226">テーブルが存在し、CopyReferenceTable が True に設定されていることを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8226">Make sure that the table exists and that CopyReferenceTable=true.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8227">0xC0208377</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8227">0xC0208377</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8228">-1071611017</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8228">-1071611017</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8229">DTS_E_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8229">DTS_E_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8230">%2 の SSIS データ フロー タスクのデータ型 "%1" は、%3 に対してはサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8230">The SSIS Data Flow Task data type "%1" on the %2 is not supported for the %3.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8237">0xC0208379</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8237">0xC0208379</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8238">-1071611015</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8238">-1071611015</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8239">DTS_E_CUSTOMPROPERTYISREADONLY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8239">DTS_E_CUSTOMPROPERTYISREADONLY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8240">%2 のカスタム プロパティ "%1" の値を変更できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8240">The value of custom property "%1" on the %2 cannot be changed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8241">0xC020837A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8241">0xC020837A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8242">-1071611014</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8242">-1071611014</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8243">DTS_E_OUTPUTCOLUMNHASNOERRORCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8243">DTS_E_OUTPUTCOLUMNHASNOERRORCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8244">エラー以外の出力の %1 には、エラー出力上に対応する出力列がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8244">The %1 on the non-error output has no corresponding output column on the error output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8245">0xC020837B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8245">0xC020837B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8246">-1071611013</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8246">-1071611013</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8247">DTS_E_ERRORCOLUMNHASNOOUTPUTCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8247">DTS_E_ERRORCOLUMNHASNOOUTPUTCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8248">エラー出力の %1 には、エラー以外の出力上に対応する出力列がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8248">The %1 on the error output has no corresponding output column on the non-error output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8249">0xC020837C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8249">0xC020837C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8250">-1071611012</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8250">-1071611012</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8251">DTS_E_ERRORCOLUMNHASINCORRECTPROPERTIES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8251">DTS_E_ERRORCOLUMNHASINCORRECTPROPERTIES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8252">エラー出力の %1 には、対応するデータ ソース列のプロパティと一致しないプロパティがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8252">The %1 on the error output has properties that do not match the properties of its corresponding data source column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8253">0xC020837D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8253">0xC020837D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8254">-1071611011</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8254">-1071611011</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8255">DTS_E_ADOSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPECANNOTBECHANGED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8255">DTS_E_ADOSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPECANNOTBECHANGED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8256">DT_WSTR 列と DT_NTEXT 列を除き、%1 の出力列のデータ型は変更できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8256">The data type of output columns on the %1 cannot be changed, except for DT_WSTR and DT_NTEXT columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8257">0xC020837F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8257">0xC020837F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8258">-1071611009</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8258">-1071611009</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8259">DTS_E_ADOSRCDATATYPEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8259">DTS_E_ADOSRCDATATYPEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8260">"%1" のデータ型が変換元の列 "%3" のデータ型 "%2" と一致しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8260">The data type of "%1" does not match the data type "%2" of the source column "%3".</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8516">0xC0209025</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8516">0xC0209025</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8517">-1071607771</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8517">-1071607771</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8518">DTS_E_FAILEDTOFINDNONSPECIALERRORCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8518">DTS_E_FAILEDTOFINDNONSPECIALERRORCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8519">%1 に特殊なエラー列以外の列が見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8519">Failed to find any non-special error column in %1.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8520">0xC0209029</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8520">0xC0209029</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8521">-1071607767</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8521">-1071607767</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8522">DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONERROR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8522">DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONERROR</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8523">SSIS エラー コード DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONERROR。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8523">SSIS Error Code DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONERROR.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8524">エラー コード 0x%2!8.8X! により、"%1" が失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8524">The "%1" failed because error code 0x%2!8.8X!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8525">"%3" のエラー行の処理により、エラーによる失敗が示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8525">occurred, and the error row disposition on "%3" specifies failure on error.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8526">ここに示されたコンポーネントのオブジェクトでエラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8526">An error occurred on the specified object of the specified component.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8527">このエラーの前に、エラーの詳細が記載されたエラー メッセージが報告されている可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8527">There may be error messages posted before this with more information about the failure.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8528">0xC020902A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8528">0xC020902A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8529">-1071607766</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8529">-1071607766</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8530">DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONTRUNCATION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8530">DTS_E_INDUCEDTRANSFORMFAILUREONTRUNCATION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8531">"%1" が切り捨ての発生により失敗しました。"%2" の切り捨て行の処理により、切り捨てによる失敗が示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8531">The "%1" failed because truncation occurred, and the truncation row disposition on "%2" specifies failure on truncation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8532">ここに示されたコンポーネントのオブジェクトで切り捨てエラーが発生しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8532">A truncation error occurred on the specified object of the specified component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8533">0xC020902B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8533">0xC020902B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8534">-1071607765</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8534">-1071607765</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8535">DTS_E_TXSPLITEXPRESSIONEVALUATEDTONULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8535">DTS_E_TXSPLITEXPRESSIONEVALUATEDTONULL</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8536">"%2" の式 "%1" は NULL と評価されましたが、"%3" ではブール型の結果が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8536">The expression "%1" on "%2" evaluated to NULL, but the "%3" requires a Boolean results.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8537">出力でのエラー行の処理を変更して、これを無効な結果として処理する (エラーを無視する) か、この行をエラー出力にリダイレクトしてください (行のリダイレクト)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8537">Modify the error row disposition on the output to treat this result as False (Ignore Failure) or to redirect this row to the error output (Redirect Row).</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8538">条件分割式の結果は、ブール型にする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8538">The expression results must be Boolean for a Conditional Split.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8539">式の結果が NULL の場合は、エラーになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8539">A NULL expression result is an error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8540">0xC020902C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8540">0xC020902C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8541">-1071607764</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8541">-1071607764</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8542">DTS_E_TXSPLITSTATIC_EXPRESSIONEVALUATEDTONULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8542">DTS_E_TXSPLITSTATIC_EXPRESSIONEVALUATEDTONULL</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8543">式は NULL と評価されましたが、ブール型の結果が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8543">The expression evaluated to NULL, but a Boolean result is required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8544">出力でのエラー行の処理を変更して、これを無効な結果として処理する (エラーを無視する) か、この行をエラー出力にリダイレクトしてください (行のリダイレクト)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8544">Modify the error row disposition on the output to treat this result as False (Ignore Failure) or to redirect this row to the error output (Redirect Row).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8545">条件分割式の結果は、ブール型にする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8545">The expression results must be Boolean for a Conditional Split.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8546">式の結果が NULL の場合は、エラーになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8546">A NULL expression result is an error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8547">0xC020902D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8547">0xC020902D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8548">-1071607763</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8548">-1071607763</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8549">DTS_E_UTF16BIGENDIANFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8549">DTS_E_UTF16BIGENDIANFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8550">UTF-16 Big Endian 形式のファイルはサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8550">The file format of UTF-16 big endian is not supported.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09c82-8551">UTF-16 Little Endian 形式のみがサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8551">Only UTF-16 little endian format is supported.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8552">0xC020902E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8552">0xC020902E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8553">-1071607762</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8553">-1071607762</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8554">DTS_E_UTF8FORMATNOTSUPPORTEDASUNICODE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8554">DTS_E_UTF8FORMATNOTSUPPORTEDASUNICODE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8555">UTF-8 のファイル形式は Unicode としてサポートされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8555">The file format of UTF-8 is not supported as Unicode.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8556">0xC020902F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8556">0xC020902F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8557">-1071607761</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8557">-1071607761</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8558">DTS_E_DTPXMLCANTREADIDATTR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8558">DTS_E_DTPXMLCANTREADIDATTR</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="09c82-8559">ID 属性を読み取れません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09c82-8559">Cannot read ID attribute.</span></span>|
